participant_1.name: Isabella Reyes
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, Isabella loves exploring new cultures and art forms. She has a penchant for historical figures and enjoys storytelling.
participant_1.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i'm an art major in college. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Resilient and inspiring, Michael has a positive outlook on life. His experiences have shaped him into a supportive and motivating individual.
participant_2.background: i am a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach.

content.text: Im a life coach.What is your job?
What do you do for living?
